entry.title: WIND WARNING , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
